changeSet.author: satya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `Preference` ( `deviceKey` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `data` text, UNIQUE KEY `deviceKey` (`deviceKey`) )

changeSet.author: satya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `AlertedKeys` ( `alertedKey` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `alertedKey` (`alertedKey`) )

changeSet.author: satya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `Alert_History` ( `uuid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `deviceKey` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `message` text, `alertTime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `programName` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `product` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `startTime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `endTime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`uuid`), KEY `deviceKey` (`deviceKey`) )
